message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for both of us! Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little more, but I'm sticking to $13,500. Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,200, but that's my absolute maximum. Can you meet me there?
